system.description:
Creates a 10-foot radius sphere where magic cannot function and spells are suppressed. Magical items become mundane and spells cannot be cast.

Scaling: At dice count 3, radius increases to 20 feet. At dice count 6, can exclude certain magical effects. At dice count 9, radius increases to 30 feet. At dice count 12, the field becomes mobile and can be projected. At dice count 15, creates a permanent antimagic zone.
